document_data.mainbody:
Noth was a priest of Bane and member of the Zhentarim inhabiting Snowmantle in Daggerdale during the  mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Circa 1369 DR, Noth was part of the combined forces of Zhentarim and Zhentilar who occupied Snowmantle. He was tasked by his commander Ragnoth with watching Juliana Saan within the Singing Dryad. Noth observed Juliana as she prepared meals for the Zhentilar soldiers and made sure she didnt sneak extra food to the slaves.
